title: Shark Sonic Duo for Carpets & Hard Floors: Carpet Cleaning
description:
There is no such thing as cleaning your carpets too often as long as the method you are using is safe for the surface but keep in mind removing dirt and soil slows down the carpet's wear process. The Shark® Sonic Duo™ cleaning system is a fun, easy, safe and gentle way to regularly clean and maintain your carpets helping them to look cleaner and brighter over time.

To learn more and purchase the product, visit www.SharkSonicDuo.com.
